string.text: Blank external drive with a connecting wire compatible with the PDAs of the Zone. These are used to create backup images of the PDAs that stalkers use. When used, the information in the PDA is converted to a cold storage format and written into the drive, creating an exact copy of the PDA's contents at that point in time. They can be used to restore data in case anything happens to the PDA, or the owner. Such PDA drives are used frequently by stalkers to create backups of their PDA in case they lose their PDA, or if they bite the dust and need to pass information onto their companions.

Unique artifact transmuted from the 'Volat Emerald'. \n \n This artifact is devoid of any actively useful properties - laboratory results show no anomalous or mundane properties of any kind, in fact, besides the constantly swirling storm in the center. Legend has it that this artifact was found only once, by the mythical Yuri Semetskiy, the man who learned to cheat death and was punished with an eternity trapped in the Zone.

Stimulating brew devised by folk craftsmen. This is a bitter drink containing concentrated caffeine and alzopram. Calms the nerves and stimulates the body. Best taken before getting into serious trouble.
